info.name: PhilipsonWinePrintable
info.description: Print wine descriptions from philipsonwine.com more compactly: Drop interfering logos, menus, some whitespace, etc.  Bottle image is preserved, but shrunk to a more reasonable size.
info.additionalInfo:
* 20180510 r3.0.0:
- Completely rewritten for new web design

* 20150720 r2.0.0:
- Get rid of new "Get 100 kr. for free for your next buy" box
- Eliminated "related" headings again (updated for current web design)
- Be careful not to remove list items unless they're really empty/blank
  (consequently blank list items may reappear in some browsers; blame the PW folks)

* 20140929 r1.0.0: First public release
